name: Review_instructions
label: Considering the content of the review, rate the level of your agreement with the following statements:

name: Helpful_decision
label: This review is helpful for me to decide about the store.

name: Helpful_familiarity
label: This review is helpful in familiarizing me with the store.

name: Helpful_Quality
label: This review is useful for me to assess the quality of the store.

name: Credibility_honest
label: This review is honest.

name: Credibility_trustworthy
label: This review is trustworthy.

name: Credibility_credible
label: This review is credible.

name: Consistency_mc
label: The arguments provided in this review are similar to its rating.

name: Quality
label: How would you rate the quality of this review?

name: Ambivalence_pos_Instructions
label: Considering only the favorable, good and reliable aspects of the store described in the review above, answer the following questions:

name: Ambivalence_pos_favorable
label: How favorable is this store in your opinion?

name: Ambivalence_pos_good
label: How good is this store in your opinion?

name: Ambivalence_pos_reliable
label: How reliable is this store in your opinion?

name: Ambivalence_neg_Instructions
label: Considering only the unfavorable, bad and unreliable aspects of the store described in the review above, answer the following questions:

name: Ambivalence_neg_unfavorable
label: How unfavorable is this store in your opinion?

name: Ambivalence_neg_bad
label: How bad is this store in your opinion?

name: Ambivalence_neg_unreliable
label: How unreliable is this store in your opinion?

name: Subjective_ambvlnc_Instructions
label: Rate the level of your agreement with the following statements about the store described in the review above:

name: Subjective_ambvlnc_feelings
label: I have mixed feelings about this store.

name: Subjective_ambvlnc_opinions
label: I have mixed opinions both for and against this store, all at the same time.

name: Subjective_ambvlnc_love_hate
label: I am torn between loving and hating this store.

name: indifference_indifferent
label: I'm pretty indifferent toward this store.

name: indifference_relevance
label: This store doesn't have much relevance to me.

name: indifference_concern
label: I don't concern myself much with this store.

name: Asses_instructions
label: Considering the answers you have provided above, please answer these last two questions:

name: Asses_confident
label: What is your level of confidence in your assessments of the store?

name: Asses_certain
label: What is your level of certainty in your assessments of the store?
